Hong Kong Company Incorporation & Setup All-in-one service (HK$3845)

Price includes company incorporation fee, first year business registration fee and the following services:

  • Set up a legal limited company

  • Appoint as company secretary for one year

    Company secretarial service includes filling in and submitting company secretarial documents like Annual Return, Notice of Change of Company Secretary and Director, Notice of Resignation of Company Secretary and Director, Notice of Change of Address of Registered Office and Significant Controllers Register etc.

  • Search company name

  • Fill in incorporation form

  • Handle Certificate of Incorporation, Business Registration Certificate

  • Amend company articles of association

  • Prepare company kit (green box)

  • Professional insiders follow up the process and accompany to open bank account

  • Continuing business consulting service and introduction of relevant experts in the industry

  • Other miscellaneous expense

Subject to your need, we could also provide company Hong Kong registered address and assist you with every related administrative task, e.g. business card design, website, office, email and telephone number etc. Details would be discussed separately.

A designated person would be assigned to follow up and answer questions from customers in order to solve all their difficulties. We focus on solving customers' enquiries regardless of working hours.
